Pre-Game Insights: Ireland head coach Heimir Hallgrímsson is desperate to nail down a regular starting-11.
Hallgrímsson has picked 18 different players in his three starting-11s to date and would like to achieve a more settled side.
Hallgrímsson admits it's a'scary thought' that Greece could start on the front-foot again, especially if Ireland produce the same sluggish start as in Helsinki on Thursday.
Hallgrímsson is looking for characters who step up in hard times and believes there are many such players in the squad.
